channel.title: [508] Summoning Ideas?
channel.description:
Hello everyone! In my server I'm making Summoning actually pretty useful! So i need some idea's for what the summoning monsters should do.
What i know what to code...
-Adding items, -Making a Stat Become Boosted (Example: Like a Strength Potion) -I'm a medium coder...
Okay so i need some ideas for these Monsters...
.Spirit Terror Bird (Would make it recharge running but you really don't need to run...Except for this one quest.)
.Granite Crab
.Praying Mantis
.Ent
.Spirit Cobra
. Spirit Daggannoth
.Thorny Snail
.Beaver
.Hydra
Please help me, Submit your ideas and i will consider them. Give me ANY ideas you have, anything is appreciated, [center][b]People That Have Submitted Ideas:[/b] dsv.13 - - - - - - -[/center]
P.S. You can submit Level requirements as in like one of my Summoning Familiars, depending on your summoning level, you get a certain amount of fish(Raw)

item.title: [508] Summoning Ideas?
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

See i could give the boosts to the Skills but I’m not sure how to make it mine faster…
I mean fishing mining wcing is fast enough…

Also i haven’t figured out yet how to make Summoning Monsters attack so the Training Attack is out…
:\

But thanks for the ideas, i will build on some of these…

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Summoning Ideas?
item.dc:creator: @dsv.13 dsv.13
item.description:
@dsv.13 wrote:

.Granite Crab -boost mining for faster mining

.Praying Mantis- fishing boost

.Ent - wcing boost

.Spirit Cobra - herblore exp

. Spirit Daggannoth - trains attk

.Thorny Snail - can wear stuff / bring to the bank

.Beaver -can cut logs

.Hydra - .-

Read full topic
